docs.snippet: The former N.F.L. receiver Chad Johnson, 36, signed a two-year contract with the Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. receiver Chad Johnson, 36, signed a two-year contract with the Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League.
docs.abstract: Former NFL receiver Chad Johnson signs two-year contract with Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League.

docs.snippet: Running back Chris Johnson, signed on Wednesday, laughed on Thursday when told of the ESPN report and said he would not have passed his physical if the Jets had any concerns....
docs.lead_paragraph: Running back Chris Johnson, signed on Wednesday, laughed on Thursday when told of the ESPN report and said he would not have passed his physical if the Jets had any concerns.
docs.abstract: Chris Johnson, signed by the New York Jets to be the breakaway runner they lacked, disputes an ESPN report that he has developed arthritis in his surgically repaired right knee; expresses confidence that he will be able to participate fully once training camp begins.

headline.main: Jets’ Newly Signed Running Back Denies Report That His Injured Knee Is Arthritic
headline.print_headline: Jets’ Newly Signed Running Back Denies Report That His Injured Knee Is Arthritic

headline.main: Countdown to the 2014 World Cup in Brazil: Day 56

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama says the Navy football team not only had to overcome tough opponents to win the Commander-in-Chief trophy this year but a government shutdown as well....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama says the Navy football team not only had to overcome tough opponents to win the Commander-in-Chief trophy this year but a government shutdown as well.

headline.main: Obama Presents Navy With Football Trophy, Again
headline.print_headline: Obama Presents Navy With Football Trophy, Again

docs.snippet: Dan Dierdorf, 64, who played offensive tackle for Michigan under Bo Schembechler, announced his return to broadcasting with a three-year contract as the radio analyst for Wolverines football....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dan Dierdorf, 64, who played offensive tackle for Michigan under Bo Schembechler, announced his return to broadcasting with a three-year contract as the radio analyst for Wolverines football.
docs.abstract: Dan Dierdorf announces his return to broadcasting, with a three-year contract as radio analyst for Michigan football; he called his final NFL game for CBS Sports in January, and had expected to retire from full-time work, but is improving after surgery in February that fused 14 joints in his spine.

headline.print_headline: Dierdorf to Be Michigan Radio Analyst

docs.snippet: A fan of the Greek team PAOK was arrested after a crate of anchovies was dumped on the visitors’ bench, delaying a Greek Cup semifinal in Thessaloniki for more than an hour....
docs.lead_paragraph: A fan of the Greek team PAOK was arrested after a crate of anchovies was dumped on the visitors’ bench, delaying a Greek Cup semifinal in Thessaloniki for more than an hour.
docs.abstract: Fan of the Greek soccer team PAOK is arrested after a crate of anchovies is dumped on bench of visiting Olympiakos, delaying a Greek Cup semifinal in Thessaloniki for more than an hour; PAOK eventually defeated Olympiakos, 1-0.

headline.main: Match Delayed by Fish and Halted by Brawls
headline.print_headline: Match Delayed by Fish and Halted by Brawls

docs.snippet: French prosecutors had launched a preliminary investigation into Qatar football club Al-Jaish after Zahir Belounis was stranded in the country for 17 months due to a financial dispute, the French player's brother said....
